messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: A freeze on energy prices until 2017 for all. 25 hours of free childcare for working families with 3 & 4-year olds. An apprenticeship for every school leaver who gets the grades. A cut of £2.5 billion to the NHS every year. A GP appointment within 48 hours.

messages.title: I will back Labour's plans to...
messages.content: Help people afford the cost of living crisis.
I will back Labour's plans to invest in the NHS, raise the minimum wage, freeze energy bills and guarantee young people a job or training.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in our health service, recruiting 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more doctors and 3,000 more midwives.
Labour's youth jobs guarantee, opportunity for young people to gain skills and experience in the workplace.
Fighting for Carlisle, investing in the NHS, energy prices freeze, and measures to help working people.

mentions.candidate: I will fight back for Carlisle in Parliament and be a strong voice for you.

issues.economy: I will back Labour's plans to help people afford the cost of living crisis.
issues.education: An apprenticeship for every school leaver who gets the grades.
issues.health: I will fight back for Carlisle: back Labour's plans to tackle the cost of living crisis.

leaflet.personalStatement: Having lived most of my life in Carlisle, going to St Bede's and Morton schools then working in retail, I know our city and its people. I will be a strong voice for Carlisle in Parliament and will always be on your side.

contactInformation.address: Carlisle Labour Party, 7-8 Old Post Office Court, Carlisle, CA3 8LE

endorsements.endorsement: A strong voice for our city in Parliament and help to make Carlisle a regional centre of excellence.
An MP who will fight for our National Health Service.
Will protect the NHS, your rights as a family, help those on the 2017 and guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours.
Voting for Lee who will back Labour's plans to guarantee young unemployed people a job or training and more opportunities for young people.

images.caption: Lee with supporters and local residents.
